constituent: ditch, moat, soil, dirt, ground, yield, flag, exit
koohiiStory1: (See dig (#1061)). When soil finally yielded thanks to your digging efforts, what you have is a ditch.
koohiiStory2: Ditch / trench. The yielding army abandons it´s patch of soil, leaving behind a landscape of ditchs and trenches. Trench warfare.
